title: Stay with me (真夜中のドア)
lyrics: tone To you... Yes, my love, to you... Yes, my love, to you, you, to you...   x2 Watashi wa watashi Anata wa anata to Yuube itteta Sonna ki mo suru wa Gurei no Jaket to ni Miwo boe ga a ru Koo hii no shi mi Aika warazu na none Show windou ni Futa ri utsure ba Stay with me Mayonaka no Doa wo tat aki Ka eranaideto na ita Ano kisetsu ga Ima me no mae Stay with me Kuchiguse wo iinaga ra Fu tari no toki wo da ite Mada wasurezu dai ji ni shitei ta   x2 Koi to ai to wa Chigau mono dayo to Yuube iwareta Sonna ki mo suru wa Nidome no fuyu ga kite Hana re tei ta Ana ta no koko ro Furik aere bait su mo Soko ni anata wo Kan jiteita no Stay with me Mayonaka no Doa wo tata ki Ko koro ni ama ga a ita Ano kisetsu ga Ima me no mae Stay with me Samishisama girawashi te O ita Rekoodo no ha ri Ona ji Merodi Kuri kaeshite ita     Stay wi th me Mayonaka no Doa wo tata ki Ka eranaideto na ita Ano kisetsu ga Ima me no mae Stay with me Kuchiguse wo iinaga ra Fu tari no toki wo da ite ada wasurezu atta tameteta
